thread.title: Shahid Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan to start shooting for 'Rangoon'
thread.title_full: Shahid Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan to start shooting for 'Rangoon' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Shahid Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan to start shooting for 'Rangoon'
text:
Shahid Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan are all set to begin filming the first schedule of Vishal Bhardwaj's upcoming film, 'Rangoon' in Arunachal Pradesh.*Shahid Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan*
A source says, "There is a lot of buzz around the film considering that Shahid and Saif are a part of it (Shahid was in a relationship with Saif's ... Â»
